name: mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server template with VS Code integration, custom agents, and GitHub API client patterns
author: Ahling Tech

variables.name: serverName
variables.description: Name of the MCP server (e.g., awesome-copilot-mcp)

variables.name: displayName
variables.description: Human-readable name for the MCP server

variables.name: description
variables.description: Brief description of what the MCP server provides

variables.name: dataSource
variables.description: Primary data source for the MCP server

variables.name: githubRepo
variables.description: GitHub repository in format owner/repo (only if dataSource is github)
